      • verify

        public boolean verify(byte[] tag,
             byte[] data,
             int offset,
             int length)
               throws OTRCryptException
        Description copied from interface: MAC
        Verifies the tag for the data provided, starting at the provided offset.
        Parameters:
        tag - the tag bytes to be verified.
        data - the data to be verified against.
        offset - the offset to start from in the array of bytes.
        length - the number of bytes to use following the offset.
        Returns:
        true if the tag is verified, false otherwise.
        Throws:
        OTRCryptException
